title: Dallas Austin in the trap! W/ Karlous Miller & Clayton English
itunes:title: Dallas Austin in the trap! W/ Karlous Miller & Clayton English
description:
Dallas Austin has laid the foundation for atlanta entertainment industries to blossom. Music and film and television wouldn’t be the same and on this episode the icon, Dallas Austin breaks it all down for Karlous Miller and Clayton English.


Michael Jackson’s magical feats, Madonnas haunted castle in LA, James Brown’s hand slapping his band before the show - Dallas has seen it ALL! - even Aliens! Plus Dallas talks about Prince’s Paisley Park greatness and his multiple moments with Shuge Knight!


Plus Dallas breaks down the making of ATL and Drumline!


If you wanted to know how Diddy found his way in the music game, facts on TLC, Monica’s start in the game - Dallas got the story and he’s sharing it in the trap. This is the coldest podcast!


Watch Karlous' Comedy Special BUY ANY MEAN$ https://www.85southshow.com/buyanymeans



Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/
